tool_description: Constructs and analyzes protein-protein interaction networks around target proteins to identify key network nodes, pathways, and potential combination targets.

seed_proteins.description: List of seed proteins to build network around

interaction_databases.description: PPI databases: STRING, BioGRID, IntAct, MINT

error_messages: Invalid seed proteins: Some proteins not found in interaction databases.
Unsupported database: Use STRING, BioGRID, IntAct, or MINT for PPI data.
Network depth out of range: Use 1-3 for manageable network size.
Invalid confidence threshold: Must be between 0.4 and 0.95 for meaningful interactions.
usage: Specify seed_proteins and interaction_databases. Set network_depth and confidence_threshold to control network size and quality. Returns network topology and centrality analysis.

network_nodes.description: All proteins in the constructed network

centrality_scores.description: Betweenness centrality scores for network nodes

hub_proteins.description: High-centrality hub proteins in the network
